title: Ep. - 248 - MARCUS LEMONIS FROM THE PROFIT ON CNBC
description:
Marcus Lemonis is the host of The Profit on CNBC. He talks about his extraordinary adoption and life story, his career, his mission to help small businesses, and his advice for business owners during these trying times.  Reality Life with Kate CaseyPatreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecaseyCameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecaseyTwitter: @katecaseyInstagram: @katecaseycaFacebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/Facebook.com/loveandknucklesAmazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
